profile.name: Alice Corry
profile.occupation: Creative Computing Student | Seeking Data Internship Opportunities
profile.summary: I'm a 3rd-year Creative Computing student working in Hospitality at M&S. I enjoy blending tech with great customer service. I've learned teamwork and problem-solving in my job. I'm actively seeking an internship in Data to enhance my skills further. I'm excited to use my tech skills in real-world situations.

responsibilities: Deliver exceptional customer service within the cafe.

Efficiently execute all cafe operations.
Collaborate with team members and supervisors.
